attributes.action: Government not Implement a banning of gender of man a curfew of 6pm.
attributes.additional_details:
Today this petition is stop cerfew of gender on male being passed in future and move to alternative better police protection higher sentences better street deterrences night marshals better link communications via cctv & police & councils night marshals
Councils offering safe routes out there local areas better protection for women beside curfew on male agender.
attributes.background: As house of lords stated & Baroness Jenny Jones as stated making ammendments to put a curfew on male gender in future require a block to be discuss any further! Alternative must be found. Police give better protection higher sentences & local councils need better defence deter repeat offenders.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

The Government has not indicated that it is considering introducing a 6pm curfew for men. We're therefore not sure exactly what action you'd like the Government or Parliament to take.
